name: epijp
title: Japanese Electronic Medicinal Product Information (ePI-JP)
description: FHIR実装ガイド：日本のPMDA要件に準拠した電子医薬品情報（ePI）の作成方法を示す。FHIR Implementation Guide representing how to create Electronic Medicinal Product Information (ePI) in alignment with Japanese PMDA requirements.

resource.description: Profile for AdministrableProductDefinition resource tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to administration details from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI AdministrableProductDefinition Profile

resource.description: Profile for Binary resource tailored for Japanese ePI, used for images or other binary content in package inserts.
resource.name: Japanese ePI Binary Profile

resource.description: Profile for Bundle resource tailored for Japanese electronic Product Information (ePI). This profile constrains the Bundle to contain the ePI Composition and related resources as per PMDA package insert requirements.
resource.name: Japanese ePI Bundle Profile

resource.description: Profile for ClinicalUseDefinition (Contraindication subtype) tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to ContraIndications from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI ClinicalUseDefinition Contraindication Profile

resource.description: Profile for ClinicalUseDefinition (Indication subtype) tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to Indications from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI ClinicalUseDefinition Indication Profile

resource.description: Profile for ClinicalUseDefinition (Interaction subtype) tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to Interactions from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI ClinicalUseDefinition Interaction Profile

resource.description: Profile for ClinicalUseDefinition (UndesirableEffect subtype) tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to AdverseReactions from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI ClinicalUseDefinition UndesirableEffect Profile

resource.description: Profile for Composition resource tailored for Japanese electronic Product Information (ePI) based on PMDA package insert structure. This profile constrains the Composition to match key sections from the provided package_insert-XML.xsd and sample XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI Composition Profile

resource.description: Profile for Ingredient resource tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to ActiveIngredient and additives from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI Ingredient Profile

resource.description: Profile for ManufacturedItemDefinition resource tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to form and properties from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI ManufacturedItemDefinition Profile

resource.description: Profile for MedicationKnowledge resource tailored for Japanese ePI, potentially mapping to additional knowledge aspects from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI MedicationKnowledge Profile

resource.description: Profile for MedicinalProductDefinition resource tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to elements like BrandName, GenericName, and ActiveIngredient from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI MedicinalProductDefinition Profile

resource.description: Profile for Organization resource tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to Manufacturer and Distributor from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI Organization Profile

resource.description: Profile for PackagedProductDefinition resource tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to Packaging from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI PackagedProductDefinition Profile

resource.description: Profile for RegulatedAuthorization resource tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to Approval and Reexamination from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI RegulatedAuthorization Profile

resource.description: Profile for SubstanceDefinition resource tailored for Japanese ePI, mapping to substance details like ActiveIngredient from PMDA XML.
resource.name: Japanese ePI SubstanceDefinition Profile
MyPatient
resource.description: An example profile of the Patient resource.

resource.name: PatientExample
resource.description: An example of a patient with a license to krill.
